$NVDA $MSFT $AAPL $QQQ I think this is how it's going to play out tomorrow. In the morning, market maker will do its best to shake out the weak hands by taking the Nasdaq down -2% (like they did on most days last week). then comes the afternoon, Nasdaq will go green and close at about 1%. These wild swings have been the new normal as of late. Welcome to the age of high-frequency trading robots + massive day traders/gamblers :-)
